      • PAINTViewRoomMsgListener

        private void PAINTViewRoomMsgListener(org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPConnection connection,
                            java.lang.String roomName)
        Touch-annotation-listener: draw circle on the screen accodring to the received coordinate, this coordinate comes from friends. then start a paint thread paintThread to draw circle.
        Parameters:
        connection - XMMP connection with each user
        roomName - chat room

      • setSurfaceSize

        public void setSurfaceSize(int width,
                  int height,
                  int visible_width,
                  int visible_height,
                  int sar_num,
                  int sar_den)
        Description copied from interface: IVideoPlayer
        This method is called by native vout to request a surface resize when frame size doesn't match surface size.
        Specified by:
        setSurfaceSize in interface IVideoPlayer
        Parameters:
        width - Frame width
        height - Frame height
        visible_width - Visible frame width
        visible_height - Visible frame height
        sar_num - Surface aspect ratio numerator
        sar_den - Surface aspect ratio denominator
